name: @wc-toolkit/zed-extension
description: Zed extension for Web Components Language Server
author: wc-toolkit

scripts.bundle:ls: mkdir -p language-server && cp -r ../language-server/bin ../language-server/dist ../language-server/package.json language-server/ && cd language-server && npm install --omit=dev
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run bundle:ls
scripts.watch: cargo watch -s 'cargo build --target wasm32-wasip1 --release && cp target/wasm32-wasip1/release/web_components.wasm extension.wasm'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run dev:install && npm run dev:reload && npm run dev:open
